page.title: 05INFORMATION / MEDIA.
page.content: One great uniting factor in many small villages is the church.Mathon church has the same vicar as neighbouring villages Cradley and Storidge which further unites this rural area.The main method of passing information is by the church news letter.Other methods are by bill boards and more importantly by word of mouth.Strangely,in rural areas where homes are far apart,news spreads very quickly from person to person.This is not due to nosyness or a tendency to gosip, but because of shear necessity. Often the only reliable way to get information from one place to another is by word of mouth;especially when conditions are bad,for instance,in times of flood or snow.
